name: The Essence of Water - World Fountain Berlin

metadata.name: EP: The Essence of Water Berlin 2021-08-17 / 7990
metadata.description:
The original has an image size of 2920px X 2920px and is available digitally for buyers.
The original is also stored in the IPFS.
The purchase does not include the exclusive right of use.

Interested to see more? Then visit my Instagram account @evaprietz and my website artworks.evaprietz.de. I look forward to you.
